member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSchemaConfig.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour
member.summary: Determines the behavior of the DeleteDatabase() function. Default value is DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.ModelObjectsOnly.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSchemaConfig.DefaultTablespace
member.summary: The name of default tablespace for the created schema. This option affect the CreateDatabase() behavior if the DeleteDatabaseBehaviour option is set to DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.Schema.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSchemaConfig.TemporaryTablespace
member.summary: The name of temporary tablespace for the created schema. This option affect the CreateDatabase() behavior if the DeleteDatabaseBehaviour option is set to DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.Schema.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSchemaConfig.Profile
member.summary: The existing profile to the created user. This option affect the CreateDatabase() behavior if the DeleteDatabaseBehaviour option is set to DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.Schema.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSchemaConfig.Grants
member.summary: The list of grants for the CREATE USER statement. This option affect the CreateDatabase() behavior if the DeleteDatabaseBehaviour option is set to DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.Schema.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderTableConfig.Tablespace
member.summary: The tablespace for the created table.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderColumnConfig.NumericIdentityBehavior
member.summary: Default value is NumericIdentityBehavior.Default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderColumnConfig.MaxStringSize
member.summary: Default value is OracleMaxStringSize.Standard.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderForeignKeyConfig.Enabled
member.summary: When set to false, this property makes the provider turn off the generation of foreign keys. This option affects the CreateDatabase() and Code-First Migrations behavior. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderForeignKeyConfig.IndexCreation
member.summary: When set to true, an index is created to the reference table columns. This option affects the CreateDatabase() behavior. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderForeignKeyConfig.IndexTablespace
member.summary: The tablespace for the created index. This option affects the CreateDatabase() behavior, if the IndexCreation option is set to 'true'.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderIndexConfig.Tablespace
member.summary: The tablespace for the created index.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour
member.summary: Determines the behavior of the DeleteDatabase() functionality.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.ModelObjectsOnly
member.summary: Only the tables and sequences that model objects are mapped to are deleted. This is the default value.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.AllSchemaObjects
member.summary: All tables and corresponding sequences used for auto-increment columns will be deleted from schemas or databases that model objects were mapped to.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.Schema
member.summary: Entire schema is deleted. If the model contains objects from other schemas, these schemas will be deleted as well.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderConfig
member.summary: Devart dotConnect for Oracle Entity Framework provider configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderConfig.SqlFormatting
member.summary: SQL formatting configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderConfig.QueryOptions
member.summary: SELECT commands configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderConfig.DmlOptions
member.summary: DML options influence only the INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE commands and Stored Procedure calls. SELECT commands are not affected by these options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderConfig.DatabaseScript
member.summary: Dynamic database generation/dropping configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderConfig.Workarounds
member.summary: Common workarounds.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderConfig.CodeFirstOptions
member.summary: Code-First and Code-First Migrations options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderConfig.SpatialOptions
member.summary: Spatial options.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig
member.summary: SQL formatting configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig.ExtraSpaces
member.summary: Determines whether to insert spaces between operators and operands and after commas. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig.MultilineStatements
member.summary: Determines whether to split statements to several lines. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig.Indenting
member.summary: Determines whether to indent keywords in multi-line queries. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig.ColumnListStacking
member.summary: Disables inserting new lines in the SELECT list. Default value is true.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderQueryConfig
member.summary: SELECT commands configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderQueryConfig.NoEscapeLike
member.summary: The possibility to turn off ESCAPE in LIKE expression. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderQueryConfig.CaseInsensitiveLike
member.summary: The possibility to turn on the case insensitive comparison mode, when using LINQ to Entities extension methods .Contains(), .EndsWith(), .StartsWith(). The default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderQueryConfig.CaseInsensitiveComparison
member.summary: The possibility to turn on the case insensitive comparison mode, when using LINQ to Entities comparison expression such as "a == b". The default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderQueryConfig.UseCSharpNullComparisonBehavior
member.summary: The default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderQueryConfig.AdvancedMetadataQuery
member.summary: Allows you to turn on the advanced metadata query mode. When set to true, the provider behaves similarly to the Visual Studio Entity Data Model Wizard when querying metadata. This mode should be used when the functionality of System.Data.Entity.Design.dll is used for metadata retrieving in the project. The default value is false.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour
member.summary: Determines how the NULL values are inserted.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour.InsertNull
member.summary: In this case nulls are inserted explicitly (for each column that do not have a non-NULL value specified).

member.name: F:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour.InsertDefaultOrNull
member.summary: In this case provider determines if there is a default value specified in the SSDL part of the model, and if it is available, this value is persisted to database. If there is no default value specified, the behaviour is identical to the InsertNull one.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour.InsertDefaultOrOmit
member.summary: In this case provider determines if there is a default value specified in the SSDL part of the model as well. However, if there is no default value specified for a column, it is omitted from the INSERT command completely.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour.Omit
member.summary: In this case provider simply omits all columns that do not have non-NULL values.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderDmlConfig
member.summary: DML options influence only the INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE commands and Stored Procedure calls. SELECT commands are not affected by these options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderDmlConfig.ParametersAsLiterals
member.summary: Determines if parameter values are inserted into SQL statements as literals instead of parameters. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderDmlConfig.InsertNullBehaviour
member.summary: Determines how the NULL values are inserted. Default value is InsertNullBehaviour.InsertNull.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderDmlConfig.ReuseParameters
member.summary: Enables reusing existing parameters instead of creating a new ones. Set this property to true only in case if a large number of the same values is sent to the database. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderDmlConfig.EmptyUpdates
member.summary: When set to false, this property makes the provider turn off the generation of fake updates for parent entities. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderDmlConfig.UseReturningClause
member.summary: Determines the provider behaviour when generating INSERT/UPDATE commands when the database-generated values must be returned. When set to true, the RETURNING clause is generated and the ROWID of the added/updated record is used. When set to false, primary key column values are used instead of the RETURNING clause and ROWID. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderDmlConfig.BatchUpdates
member.summary: Batch Updates functionality configuration.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderBatchUpdateConfig
member.summary: Batch Updates functionality configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderBatchUpdateConfig.Enabled
member.summary: Enables or disables Batch Updates functionality. If set to false, other BatchUpdates settings are ignored. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderBatchUpdateConfig.BatchSize
member.summary: Specifies the maximal number of commands in a batch. Default value is 30.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderBatchUpdateConfig.AsynchronousBatch
member.summary: Specifies whether batches are executed asynchronously (false by default), or new batch will be created and executed only after the successful execution of the previous batch. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderBatchUpdateConfig.ConcurrencyCheck
member.summary: Enables or disables concurrency check. Default value is false.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig
member.summary: Common workarounds.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig.IgnoreSchemaName
member.summary: When set to true, this property makes provider to remove the schema (database) name from all commands and queries, no matter whether Schema specified in the model or not. Command will be using the schema from the connection. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig.IgnoreDboSchemaName
member.summary: When set to true, this property makes provider to remove the "dbo" schema (database) name from all commands and queries. Command will be using the schema from the connection. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig.DisableQuoting
member.summary: Disables quoting all identifiers in all queries and commands. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig.UseInvariantProviderManifestToken
member.summary: If set to true, the invariant string literal is always returned as the provider manifest token. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig.ProviderManifestToken
member.summary: Default value is empty string.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig.ColumnTypeCasingConventionCompatibility
member.summary:
This option allows you to avoid explicitly turning off the ColumnTypeCasingConvention for each DbContext when working with Devart dotConnect for Oracle.
By default it is set to false.
When using XML mapping (Entity Framework v1 and v4) - a edmx/edml file and ObjectContext or DbContext in the XML mapping mode - this option must be FALSE.
When using Entity Framework Code First (Entity Framework v1 and v4), this option can be true or false, but if it is set to false, you must turn off ColumnTypeCasingConvention explicitly for each DbContext.
This option must be TRUE for EF Code-First Migrations (EF v4.3.x and v5.x) to work correctly.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig
member.summary: Code-First and Code-First Migrations options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig.DisableIndexQuoting
member.summary: Disables quoting all indexes in Code-First Migrations. Use DisableIndexQuoting for backward compatibility with old Code-First Migrations projects (migrations created and applied with 6.xx versions of dotConnect for Oracle). Do not use this configuration option with new projects. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig.RemoveSchemaFromDefaultConstraintName
member.summary: When set to true, the schema (database) name prefix is removed from default constraint names (primary keys, foreign keys) generated by Code-First Migrations. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig.AddTableNameInDefaultIndexName
member.summary: When set to true, the table name is added to default index name generated by Code-First Migrations (like 'IX_TableName_ColumnName'). When set to false, then default index names will be like 'IX_ColumnName'. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig.UseNonUnicodeStrings
member.summary: When set to true, string properties without an explicitly specified server data type will be treated as non-unicode. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig.UseNonLobStrings
member.summary: When set to true, string properties without an explicitly specified server data type will be treated as non-LOB. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig.TruncateLongDefaultNames
member.summary: When set to true, long default names of indexes, primary keys, foreign keys, triggers, and sequences, generated by Code-First Migrations, will be truncated and renamed if they exceed the limit of 30 characters. When set to false, an exception will be raised for long default names generated by Code-First Migrations if they are too long. This option does not affect the truncation of long default names generated by Code-First CreateDatabase() and DropDatabase() functionality. They are always truncated if they exceed the limit of 30 characters. However it affects the algorithm of this truncation and renaming of these identifiers. When it is set to true, the names of these identifiers are identical both in Code-First CreateDatabase() and in Code-First Migrations. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig.ColumnTypeCasingConventionCompatibility
member.summary:
This option allows you to avoid explicitly turning off the ColumnTypeCasingConvention for each DbContext when working with Devart dotConnect for Oracle.
By default it is set to false.
When using XML mapping (Entity Framework v1 and v4) - a edmx/edml file and ObjectContext or DbContext in the XML mapping mode - this option must be FALSE.
When using Entity Framework Code First (Entity Framework v4 and higher), this option can be true or false, but if it is set to false, you must turn off ColumnTypeCasingConvention explicitly for each DbContext.
This option must be TRUE for EF Code-First Migrations (EF v4.3.x, v5.x and v6.x) to work correctly.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSpatialConfig
member.summary: Spatial options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSpatialConfig.GeometryDefaultSrid
member.summary: Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSpatialConfig.GeographyDefaultSrid
member.summary: Default value is 4326 (WGS84).

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSpatialConfig.AlwaysUseGeometryDefaultSrid
member.summary: Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Configuration.OracleEntityProviderSpatialConfig.AlwaysUseGeographyDefaultSrid
member.summary: Default value is false.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.OracleJsonFunctions
member.summary: Oracle JSON functions.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.OracleSpatialFunctions
member.summary: Oracle Spatial functions.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.OracleTextFunctions
member.summary: Oracle Text (full-text search) functions.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.OracleCtxDdlPackage
member.summary: Oracle CTX_DDL package.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAddColumnConfiguration
member.summary: AddColumn operation can be customized with the OracleAddColumnConfiguration class. See http://www.devart.com/blogs/dotconnect/index.php/entity-framework-code-first-migrations-support-for-oracle-mysql-postgresql-and-sqlite.html#DatabaseSpecific

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAddColumnConfiguration.NotNullConstraintName
member.summary: The name of the NOT NULL constraint. By default, an unnamed NOT NULL constraint is created

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAddColumnConfiguration.CheckConstraintName
member.summary: The name of the check constraint.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAddColumnConfiguration.CheckConstraintColumnRestriction
member.summary: The expression of the сheck constraint (for example, “IN (‘A’, ‘B’, ‘C’)”).

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAddColumnConfiguration.CheckConstraintExpression
member.summary: The full expression of the сheck constraint (for example, “COLUMN_NAME IN (‘A’, ‘B’, ‘C’)”).

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAddColumnConfiguration.VirtualColumnExpression
member.summary: The expression for the virtual column (for example, “FIRST_COLUMN * SECOND_COLUMN – THIRD_COLUMN”).

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAlterColumnConfiguration
member.summary: AlterColumn operation can be customized with the OracleAlterColumnConfiguration class. See http://www.devart.com/blogs/dotconnect/index.php/entity-framework-code-first-migrations-support-for-oracle-mysql-postgresql-and-sqlite.html#DatabaseSpecific

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAlterColumnConfiguration.LobModificationAllowed
member.summary: Determines whether to allow LOB column modification. Data type is not modified, only other column parameters are modified. False by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAlterColumnConfiguration.DataTypeAlteringEnabled
member.summary: Determines whether to modify data type. True by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAlterColumnConfiguration.DefaultValueAlteringEnabled
member.summary: Determines whether to modify the default value. True by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAlterColumnConfiguration.NullableAlteringEnabled
member.summary: Determines whether to modify NULL/NOT NULL constraint. True by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAlterColumnConfiguration.ErrorCatchingForNullableAltering
member.summary: Determines whether to generate an additional DDL code for catching and processing errors that occur in case of unsuccessful modification of the NULL/NOT NULL constraint for columns that have the same nullability as the one applied by this modification. True by default.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateIndexConfiguration
member.summary: CreateIndex operation can be customized with the OracleCreateIndexConfiguration class. See http://www.devart.com/blogs/dotconnect/index.php/entity-framework-code-first-migrations-support-for-oracle-mysql-postgresql-and-sqlite.html#DatabaseSpecific

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateIndexConfiguration.IsBitmap
member.summary: Determines whether to create a bitmap index. False by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateIndexConfiguration.Reversed
member.summary: Determines whether to create a reverse ordered index. False by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateIndexConfiguration.Unsorted
member.summary: Determines whether to create an unsorted index. False by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateIndexConfiguration.Unlogged
member.summary: Determines whether to create an unlogged index. False by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateIndexConfiguration.Expression
member.summary: Specifies the expression for the expression-based (function-based) index.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateIndexConfiguration.Tablespace
member.summary: Specifies TABLESPACE for an index.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateTableConfiguration
member.summary: CreateTable operation can be customized with the OracleCreateTableConfiguration class. See http://www.devart.com/blogs/dotconnect/index.php/entity-framework-code-first-migrations-support-for-oracle-mysql-postgresql-and-sqlite.html#DatabaseSpecific

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateTableConfiguration.Tablespace
member.summary: Specifies TABLESPACE for the table.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateTableConfiguration.Unlogged
member.summary: If set to True, an unlogged table is created. False by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateTableConfiguration.IdentityTriggerName
member.summary: The name of the trigger. If the primary key is specified as database-generated (Identity option), then a sequence and an insert trigger will be generated for this table to make this column autoincrement.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateTableConfiguration.IdentitySequenceName
member.summary: The name of the sequence. If the primary key is specified as database-generated (Identity option), then a sequence and an insert trigger will be generated for this table to make this column autoincrement.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleDropIndexConfiguration
member.summary: DropIndex operation can be customized with the OracleDropIndexConfiguration class.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleDropTableConfiguration
member.summary: DropTable operation can be customized with the OracleDropTableConfiguration class.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleDropTableConfiguration.IdentitySequenceDroppingEnabled
member.summary: Determines whether to delete a sequence.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleDropTableConfiguration.IdentitySequenceName
member.summary: The name of the sequence.

member.name: M:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleMigrationConverter.ResolveConflictWithPrimaryKeyAndIndexCreation
member.summary: Remove CreateIndexAction or DbIndex in CreateTableAction if AddPrimaryKeyAction or DbPrimaryKey in CreateTableAction with same column list exists. Oracle does not support additional index on same column list (PK and explicit index).

member.name: M:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleMigrationConverter.RemoveExplicitIndexDroppingIfTableAlsoDropping
member.summary: Remove DropIndexAction for default-named (unnamed) index without user-defined Oracle-specific features if DropTableAction exists.
